arts.ttl: Ian Glavinovich, teenager Andrew Rick lead Union to 1-0 victory over St. Louis City
arts.sum: Ian Glavinovich scored his first career goal early, and teenager Andrew Rick made it stand up for his second career clean sheet in the Philadelphia Union’s 1-0 victory over St. Louis City at Subaru Park on Saturday night in the first meeting between the clubs. Ben Lundt made his second start filling in for injured starter Roman Bürki and finished with a career-high nine saves for St. Louis City (2-1-2).

arts.ttl: Preview: Philadelphia Union vs. St Louis City - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Major League Soccer clash between Philadelphia Union and St Louis City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
